original_text: You used some of your clothes to give honour to idols. You made their altars beautiful. You had sex with those men there on your beautiful cloths. Those things should never happen!
korean_text: 네가 네 의복을 가지고 너를 위하여 각색으로 산당을 꾸미고 거기에서 행음하였나니 이런 일은 전무후무하니라

sentences.original_text: You used some of your clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 옷 중 일부를 사용하여

sentences.original_text: You had sex with those men

sentences.korean_translation: 그런 일은 결코 일어나지 말아야 한다
